sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: These Terms & Conditions ('Terms') govern your use of alltripp.com ('Website') and all services provided by AllTripp Tours & Travels ('we', 'our', 'us'). By accessing the Website or booking our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our Website or services.

sections.title: 2. Services Overview
sections.content: We are a travel facilitator, offering services such as booking flights, hotels, and transportation; organizing guided tours and activities; and providing travel assistance. We partner with third-party suppliers (e.g., airlines, hotels, tour operators). Your booking is subject to the terms and conditions of these third-party suppliers.

sections.title: 3. Booking and Payment
sections.content: To make a booking, you must provide accurate and complete information. A deposit or full payment may be required at the time of booking. Prices are subject to change until the booking is confirmed. We accept various payment methods, which will be specified at the time of booking.

sections.title: 4. User Responsibilities
sections.content: You are responsible for ensuring that you have valid passports, visas, and any other required travel documents. You must also comply with all health and safety regulations. It is your responsibility to arrive on time for all departures and activities. Any disruptive behavior may result in termination of your trip without a refund.

sections.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Our liability is limited to the total amount you paid for the service. We are not liable for any indirect or consequential damages, or for any loss or damage caused by third-party suppliers. We are not responsible for events outside our control, such as natural disasters, strikes, or political unrest (Force Majeure).

sections.title: 6. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on our Website, including text, images, and logos, is the property of AllTripp or its licensors and is protected by copyright and trademark laws. You may not use any content from our Website without our prior written permission.

sections.title: 7. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
sections.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes arising from these Terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Delhi, India.

sections.title: 8. Changes to These Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to update these Terms at any time. Any changes will be posted on our Website, and your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

sections.title: 1. Cancellation by You
sections.content:
If you wish to cancel your booking, you must notify us in writing. The following cancellation fees apply: 
- 30 days or more before departure: Full refund minus a 10% processing fee. 
- 15-29 days before departure: 50% refund. 
- Less than 15 days before departure: No refund. 
Certain bookings may be non-refundable; this will be specified at the time of booking.

sections.title: 2. Cancellation by Us
sections.content: We reserve the right to cancel your booking for reasons such as safety concerns, insufficient demand, or other unforeseen circumstances. In such cases, we will offer you the choice of a full refund or an alternative trip of equivalent value.

sections.title: 3. Refund Process
sections.content: Refunds will be processed within 7-10 business days of the cancellation confirmation. All refunds will be credited to the original method of payment. Please note that it may take additional time for the refund to appear on your statement, depending on your bank.

sections.title: 4. Non-Refundable Items
sections.content:
Certain items are non-refundable, including but not limited to: 
- Flights and other transportation tickets, unless otherwise specified. 
- Travel insurance premiums. 
- Booking and processing fees. 
- Any services already used.

sections.title: 5. Contact Information
sections.content: For any questions regarding our refund and cancellation policy, please contact us at refund@alltripp.com or call us at +91-9266602470.
